name: Cragmaw Hideout
description: Cave complex in hillside 5 miles from goblin ambush site. Cragmaw tribe hideout led by bugbear Klarg. Stream flows out of cave mouth screened by briar thickets.
atmosphere: Damp cave, sound of running water. Steep upward slope. Stalactite-covered vaults 20-30 ft high. Goblins have fortified with crude traps.

general_features.stream: 2 ft deep, cold, slow - easily wadeable
general_features.sound: Water muffles noise - DC 15 Perception to hear nearby areas

1_cave_mouth.description: Stream flows from cave screened by dense briars. Narrow dry path on right side.
1_cave_mouth.tactics: Goblins in Area 2 should be watching but are lazy

2_goblin_blind.description: Hollowed-out lookout in briar thickets on east side. Wooden planks flatten briars.
2_goblin_blind.tactics: Shoot through thickets if spot intruders. Shout alarm to Areas 4 and 6 if attacked.

3_kennel.description: Small dank chamber up stone steps from main passage. Filled with animal stench.
features: Narrow fissure to Area 8 (DC 10 Athletics to climb)
3_kennel.tactics: Attack anyone except goblins entering room. Can be calmed DC 15 Animal Handling (DC 10 if fed).
3_kennel.trap: If provoked but unreachable, wolves make DC 15 Str checks each round. First success loosens (DC drops to 10), second success frees them.

4_steep_passage.description: Main passage climbs steeply. Stream splashes down west side.
4_steep_passage.secret: Goblin on bridge (Area 5) may spot party - contested Stealth vs Perception

5_overpass.description: High tunnel crosses main cavern. Rickety wood/rope bridge spans passage 20 ft above stream.
5_overpass.tactics: If spots party, signals Area 7 to release flood, then throws javelins down.
5_overpass.bridge_stats: AC 5, 10 hp. Destroyed = DC 10 Dex save or fall 20 ft for 2d6 damage
5_overpass.flood_trigger: Goblin signals Area 7 - see Flood! event

6_goblin_den.description: Large cave divided by 10-ft escarpment. Cooking fire smoke, stench of hides and unwashed goblins.
6_goblin_den.enemies: 6 goblins (5 regular + Yeemik leader with 12 hp)
6_goblin_den.tactics: Yeemik grabs Sildar, threatens to kill. Wants party to kill Klarg in Area 8. Will betray party even if they agree. If refused, shoves Sildar off ledge (1d6 damage = death).
6_goblin_den.treasure: Yeemik has 3 gold teeth (1 gp each) + 15 sp

7_twin_pools.description: Half-filled with two large pools fed by waterfall in east wall. Drains west to stream. Low fieldstone dams.
7_twin_pools.tactics: If alerted, one flees to warn Area 8. Others fight.
7_twin_pools.flood_mechanism: Goblins can knock away dam supports. Next round, water floods down to Area 1. All in tunnel: DC 10 Dex save to reach Area 3/4 safe spots or DC 15 Str save to hold on, else swept to Area 1 for 1d6 damage.

8_klargs_cave.description: Sacks and crates piled south end. Floor slopes to dark opening west. Large fire pit in center (hot coals).
8_klargs_cave.tactics: If warned, Klarg and wolf hide behind stalagmites, goblins behind supplies for ambush. If wolf dies, Klarg flees down chimney to Area 3.
8_klargs_cave.treasure: Chest under bed: 600 cp, 110 sp, 2 potions of healing, jade frog statuette (40 gp). Supplies marked with blue lion = Lionshield Coster (50 gp reward in Phandalin).

flood.trigger: Goblin in Area 5 or 7 releases dam
flood.timing: Signaled one round, floods next round
flood.effect: All in main tunnel DC 10 Dex to reach safety or DC 15 Str to hold on, else knocked prone and washed to Area 1 for 1d6 damage

total_xp: ~275 + 200 for Sildar rescue = Advancement to Level 2
exit_paths: Return to trail, continue to Phandalin
Sildar offers 50 gp escort to Phandalin
